SimpleTerrain.DefaultCost: Default value set from the Scene configuration
SimpleTerrain.opacity.name: Terrain Opacity
SimpleTerrain.show-text.name: Show Text
SimpleTerrain.show-text.hint: Show the text of how difficult the terrain is.
SimpleTerrain.show-icon.name: Show Icons
SimpleTerrain.show-icon.hint: Show the icon for the environment of the terrain.
SimpleTerrain.tokens-cause-difficult.hin: When a token is dragged over another token, it's considered difficult terrain.
SimpleTerrain.dead-cause-difficult.name: Include Dead Tokens
SimpleTerrain.dead-cause-difficult.hint: When a token is dragged over a dead token, it's considered difficult terrain.
SimpleTerrain.use-obstacles.name: Use Additional Obstacles
SimpleTerrain.use-obstacles.hint: Allow the additional use of obstacles in combination with an environment.
SimpleTerrain.minimum-cost.name: Minimum Cost
SimpleTerrain.minimum-cost.hint: Minimum cost you can set difficult terrain to
SimpleTerrain.maximum-cost.name: Maximum Cost
SimpleTerrain.maximum-cost.hint: Maximum cost you can set difficult terrain to
SimpleTerrain.draw-border.name: Draw Border
SimpleTerrain.draw-border.hint: Set if the border is drawn or not
SimpleTerrain.terrain-image.name: Terrain Image
SimpleTerrain.terrain-image.hint: Change the background texture for terrain
SimpleTerrain.rule-provider.name: Rule provider
SimpleTerrain.rule-provider.hint: Which rule provider should Simple Terrain pull it's terrain rules from
SimpleTerrain.transfer-color.name: Transfer spell colour
SimpleTerrain.transfer-color.hint: When casting a spell that causes difficult terrain, transfer the default environment colour to the measured template.
